## PopulatableEthersLiquity.depositCollateral() method

Adjust existing Trove by depositing more collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
depositCollateral(amount: any, ICRWithFees: any, overrides: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | any | The amount of collateral to add to the Trove's existing collateral. |
|  ICRWithFees | any |  |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

any

